full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
**Project Title:** Supplementary Snow Removal Services, St Lewis, NL
**Project ID:** 30003162

**Objective:**

The objective of this procurement is to supply snow removal services for Fisheries and Oceans Canada’s office in St. Lewis, NL.

**Scope of Work:**

The successful bidder will be required to provide the necessary equipment, labour, and personnel to clear snow and ice from the parking lot, walkways, and entrances. Priority will be given to operations that ensure the unhindered flow of vehicular traffic and public safety.

**Period of Contract:**

The contract will commence upon awarding to the selected bidder and will continue until December 31, 2023. Three (3) one-year options will be available for exercise at the discretion of the contracting entity.

**Prescribed Trade Agreements:**

The requirement is subject to various trade agreements, specifically the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Key Requirements:**

* Snow removal and ice control services will be available during regular working hours, silent hours, and weekends.
* Contractor will be responsible for providing service within one (1) hour of receiving a call for service.
* The contractor will be responsible for regular inspections to ensure timely snow and ice removal.

**Security Clearances:**

No security clearance is required for this procurement.

**Contact Information:**

Martin Larocque
Contracting Authority
819-454-2077
DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

**Additional Information:**

Interested suppliers shall submit their proposals according to the instructions outlined in this tender. Bidders should note that “buyandsell.gc.ca” is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents. The contracting entity reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier.

### Solicitation Document

To access the full solicitation document, please visit [this URL](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/07/af733a56e8e79fc95bbbba9622073222/30003162_-_rfp_-_snow_removal_-_en_v3.2.pdf) and [this URL](https://canadabuys.canada
